title: gifting error
body: i can't gift when i click it tells me restart your client or contact the support what's the probleme what should i do ?

replies.body:
There might be a corrupted file somewhere in your installation that's causing the gifting system to throw this error. Let's see if a full repair can get that fixed up and get you raining gifts again!

- Pull up the click, click on the gear in the upper-right corner, and then click on full repair. 

Hit us back up if that doesn't seem to help!
